contactSupportToModifyInfo: Contact support to modify this information
companyOwnerIdDocument: Identification document of company owner (Passport / NIC)
kycHeader: Please fill out the following information
kycSupportedFilesHiPay: Supported documents formats: PDF, JPEG, JPG, PNG. Maximum document size: 2Mb
kycSupportedFilesStripe: Supported documents formats: JPEG, JPG, PNG. Maximum document size: 2Mb
companyRegistrationInformationTooltip: This person must appear in the company registration document to be provided in this page
companyInformationValidationMessage: You are about to submit legal information regarding your company. You will not be able to change this information once you confirm them. In the next page of the enrollment process you will be requested to upload documents matching the information you just entered.
pleaseConfirmFollowingInformation: Please confirm the following information by ticking the boxes below
posessCompanyrepResentativeID: I am in possession  of a company representative ID.
companyRepresentativeNameMatchesID: The company representative name ({0}) I entered previously exactly matches the name on the ID I will provide.
posessCompanyDocWithRepresentativeName: I am in possession  of the company registration document on which the legal representative name is mentioned.
companyNameAndAddressMatchDoc: The company name and address I entered previously exactly matches the ones mentioned on the registration document.
tickingBoxesMandatory: Ticking all the boxes above is mandatory to proceed further in the enrollment process.
legalRepresentativeNameTooltip: Company representative names are used for registration and legal purpose. It must appear in the company legal documents
noStakeholderHasMoreThan: No single stakeholder in the company holds more than {0}%
title: Title
passportOrIdCardOrDrivingLicence: Passport, identity card or driving licence
companyBankingInformationDocument: This document should match the name and address of your company as well as the account details mentioned below
isDecisionMaker: This person is a decision maker in this company
indentityDocumentIdentificationNumber: Passport or ID card identification number
kycInformation: The following information and document(s) are required to manage your payments and to comply with anti-money laundering regulations known as Know-Your-Customer (KYC). They will not be visible to any user of the service.
noShareHolder: No single stakeholder in the company holds more than 25%
errorSaveUBO: An error occured. We were unable to save the beneficiary informations. Please check the data provided then try again.
errorSaveUboAddress: An error occured. We were not able to save the address of the beneficiary. Please check the data provided then try again.
errorSavePerson: An error occured. We were unable to save the person informations. Please check the data provided then try again.
errorSavePersonAddress: An error occured. We were not able to save the address of the person. Please check the data provided then try again.
stripePersonalIdNumberTooltip: Refers to the social security number
uboDocMustContainAddress: A document showing person’s address, either a passport, local ID card, or utility bill from well-known utility company. It should match the address entered on the previous page.
uboIdNumberMustMatchDocument: The number entered here should appear on the document uploaded below
failedToLoadUbo: UBO data could not be loaded
companyManagementAndOwnershipInfoEU: One company representative and at least one company executive have to be declared. They can be the same person.
companyManagementAndOwnershipInfoUS: One company representative has to be declared
representativeAndExecutiveOrOwnerMissing: Company representative & executive or owner are missing
executiveOrOwnerMissing: Company executive or owner is missing
errorSavePersone: An error occured. Unable to finalize persons declaration
phoneNumberTootlip: Warning : Prefix by  '+' sign and the country code’ (e.g. +441234567890 for the UK)
